title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (13/12/2008 05:52): Sandbox.testwiki was modified by XWiki.lostmindio (deleted document) - http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Sandbox/testwiki  
xwikibot - (13/12/2008 10:34): Extensions.MediaWiki2XWikiExtension was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added Encodo link) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extensions/MediaWiki2XWikiExtension  
xwikibot - (13/12/2008 10:36): Extensions.MediaWiki2XWikiExtension was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extensions/MediaWiki2XWikiExtension  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:00): it is possible to add some properties to a user? I didn't find the class defintion for xwikis users  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:13): asyd:  yes it's possible  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:13): how? ;p  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:13): asyd: the class is called XWiki.XWikiUsers  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:16): well, I tried XWiki/XWikiUsers?xpage=editclass but I don't have the usual editclass page  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:16): let me try  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:17): asyd: http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/XWikiUsers?editor=class  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:17): just use the menus  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:17): that's what I did  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:17): Edit > Class  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:17): (when on XWiki.XWikiUsers page)  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:18): and you can see the list of the properties, and add a new one?!  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:18): ahh  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:19): thanks  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:26): hmm, with a fresh install of xwiki1.7 (using mysql backend) I have a problem with users and groups, I can add somes, but I can't seem them in the adminapp  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:26): http://kaoru.asyd.net/~asyd/xwiki-user-list.pdf  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:27): tried both safari/firefox  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:28): trying  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:29): asyd: just tried, works fine  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:29): several questions: how did you add the users? using the "add new user" button?  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:30): this is what I did and it worked fine  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:30): and the table was refreshed to show the newly added user  
asyd - (13/12/2008 16:30): yes, exactly  
vmassol - (13/12/2008 16:58): hmm then I have no idea. I'd need to be able to reproduce it.
